item.title: Breakthrough Publication from Innovation Team - Kudos to Melba Simon on her lead-author publication in Chemical and Engineering Technology. This milestone highlights a novel enantio-separation approach, made possible by collaboration across Innovation, Engineering, Chemistry, and Analytical teams.

item.title: Nxera Project Milestone Achieved - The team achieved the first successful direct crystallization of NXE0033744 (Form 2), unlocking a project extension to optimize for scalability. Well done to Cillian, Israel, Jacek, Revathy, Alina and Guangyang.
